org.magelan.core.entity
Class PolyLineEntity

java.lang.Object
  org.magelan.core.DefaultEntity
      org.magelan.core.entity.PolyLineEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Entity, ExplodableEntity, DrawingElement
public class PolyLineEntity
extends DefaultEntity
implements ExplodableEntity

An entity class representing a poly-line. Poly-lines return handles at the end of each line and one additional handle (its weight center) to be used for moving.

Entity completeness checklist:
equals(Object)
clone()
serialVersionUID
readObject/writeObject
BeanInfo

Version:
2.3, 01/2006
Author:
Assen Antov

explode

public java.util.Iterator explode()
Description copied from interface: ExplodableEntity
Explodes the entity. Calling this method does not mean that the parent entity will be deleted or any other action concerning it is about to be taken. The method should not return the same entity instances more than once.

Specified by:
explode in interface ExplodableEntity
Returns:
a list of exploded entities or null, if the entity cannot be exploded
